storyInfo: One day before Amiya leaves for Londinium, she receives a physical from Warfarin. Warfarin is unexpectedly solemn this timeâ€”

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin, is there something wrong with me?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yep, we've got a big problem.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hwuh?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You got taller.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't scare me like that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This is serious. It's been two centuries since I got any taller.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your physical indicators are all normal, and your Oripathy is pretty stable, too. Not bad.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But if you can, try not to take your rings off after you get to Londinium.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Though I guess I can't expect you to hear me on that one.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Um... Dr. Warfarin, are you mad that we're going to Londinium?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mad? Amiya, tap into your powers and look at me. How am I feeling?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Very calm.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Looks like I'm not so muddled that I can't figure out my own emotions. Not yet anyway.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Two hundred years ago, I probably would've had something to say about this. These days, though, I'm not going to get upset over something decided by destiny. If I have the time, I might as well do some more research.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Decided by destiny...? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Like how you're destined to fight this fight.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And Londinium's destined to face war, death, and hate.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Stop. I know what you're going to say, and I've heard it more times than I care to count.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm not trying to blame you, and I'm not angry. If this was enough to piss me off, I would've been pissed to death centuries ago.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Here, let me draw some blood. For bloodwork.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Okay...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That reminds me, have I ever told you why I became a doctor, even though I'm a Vampire?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Oh, I feel like you have.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I think you said you used to be a very aggressive, violent lady. Because you had a thirst for blood, like the rest of your kind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, in the end, you got tired of fighting.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, so I told you already, huh? Hmph, and here I just came up with a story about being a Vampire heroine. I was looking forward to duping some fools with it.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I don't think a lot of people would fall for that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now that's hard to say. It might just help me rebuild my dignified image here at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Your image is what it is because you keep doing things like that!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, fine. It's not like I actually care about this anyway.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I digress, but there's one thing I definitely haven't told you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The truth is, it doesn't matter how much you like doing something. If you keep doing it for a hundred years, you're bound to get tired of it. Most Vampires are sick of fighting for exactly that reason.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But at the same time, a century of doing the same thing also eventually turns it into a habit. And when everyone in your tribe has this habit, it becomes the tribe's social norm.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: In other words, it's a social norm for us Vampires to thirst for blood and war.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And, to this day, I still haven't overcome my 'social norm.'
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But you haven't ever had any real accidents on the ship.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course not. I've trained myself for two whole centuries. The stuff you see me pulling is just a pastime of mine.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Don't look at me like that. I'll admit, I do lose control when I'm with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But about that, I've actually come up with a few new ideas ever since we started getting all this new blood on the ship. Still need some tinkering, though...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Uh, let's shelve that topic for now. Anyway, the reason I became a doctor is a simple one. I got tired of war. I got sick of it.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And I chose to reject the Vampire social norm, and while I looked for a way to overcome my instincts, I inevitably became a medical researcher.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Is that how you met Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Well, she's a mysterious one, and she holds a bunch of titles, but she's a doctor alright, and I can see why you'd think that's how we met.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Though, in your view, is she really the kind of woman who'd sit down and discuss medical theory?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Or, actually, do I look like that kind of woman to you?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But you met each other a long time ago, didn't you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wait a second.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Should be this one, I think?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Wait, no, this is the book that we did together later.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: What's this stinking thing all falling apart? Oh, now I remember. This is the journal where my first dissertation was published, and I kept it after it ceased publication.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There we go. These magazines here.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: These are from decades ago!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I wrote for this magazine at the time, and then, one day, some dipshit showed up to write a long article supposedly poking holes in all my theories.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: The key thing here is that I wasn't wrong, but all the things she pointed out were indeed issues that I neglected or didn't consider.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I wasn't about to sit down and take all that from her, so I followed her reasoning and did my experiment again, and it actually gave me better results.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Back then, basically anyone could publish whatever in a magazine, and her article was one of the few that I thought was up to snuff.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And she was...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, of course. She didn't even bother to use a pen name.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You know what really pissed me off, though? I wrote a dozen or so articles after that in response but she never submitted again!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That sounds just like Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Until one day, a woman representing Theresa, the Sarkaz King, invited me to join them. She even pulled out all these magazines and told me she was that very Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Mhmm. So what happened next?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I blasted her out the door and never wrote for the magazine again.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hm, I still remember when Dr. Kal'tsit said she was going to take me to see another doctor. I thought you were her friend.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Warfarin, this is an official summons from the Royal Court! How dare you disobey us?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Little fella, I've lived for a long time now. Do you know how many Royal Court fancy folk I've met, and how many of them I kicked right out my door?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is war! The fate of our kind hangs in the balance!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Ugh... W-What did you do... to me...?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Stand here for another ten seconds and your blood will start to coagulate. Fifteen seconds later, you'll be a statue. If you leave now, you can still make it out alive.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Impossible. I've never heard of a Vampire power like this!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You're welcome to stay and see for yourself.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Gah! Don't you think you can disobey the Royal Court!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. I've heard that plenty of times, too.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Eh, looks like I need to find a new place to live. Again. I've made plenty of money, so maybe it's high time I moved to Victoria.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: All this medical equipment would be a pain to haul there, though...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hey, Warfarin, can you really turn people into statues?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Of course not. I was just scaring him.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Well, alright. I didn't know you were such a big shot, though.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Oh, shut up. I told you long ago that I'm a famous doctor among the Vampires.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: None of us have ever heard of any Vampire doctors to begin with...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Why are you out here in the middle of nowhere, then?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Because I want to be.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Because we're close to the Kazdel border, which makes it easy to mail dissertations out of the country.
What's going on today...? There's no end to this stream of unwelcome visitors, is there?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Someone seeking medical help.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Too bad. I don't treat those who fight in wars.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'll chase her away for you, Warfarin.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: By yourself? Forget it. Better keep your blood in your body. Take the medicine and bring it home to your mother.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Uhh... okay.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Youth

attributes.content: Your reputation precedes you here.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's nowhere near as thunderous as your name.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: So, what's the big idea, Kal'tsit? You, of all people, need treatment from me?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm not the one who needs treatment. She is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: H-Hello.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You know my rules, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No matter how you slice it, Theresa is fighting in this war, and you work for Theresa.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No matter who you bring me, I won't take them as a patient.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Theresa is dead, Warfarin. This girl is the new King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: At the time, you only came up to my elbow. At this rate, you'll be taller than me in a few years.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Four years have flashed right by.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I was actually really surprised when I first met you, too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because I don't look like a doctor?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whatever, it's not like I care about keeping up arrogant appearances like Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I remember Dr. Kal'tsit saying Rhodes Island was preparing to leave Kazdel, and the facilities onboard were in varying degrees of disrepair, so she had to take me somewhere else for treatment.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She told me she was taking me to see a Vampire doctor, but that she's special in that she likes research more than blood.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She also said that the doctor is very skilled, and that the Royal Court tries to enlist her services every time there's a war, but she always turns them down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She told you the truth, huh? Here I thought she'd exaggerate things to sully my name.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ahaha.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Speaking of which, may I ask you a question, Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that'll get you to stop sticking a 'Doctor' in front of my name.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Theoretically, you're my superior now.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hm, but you're the one who saved my life. Besides, it was you and Dr. Kal'tsit who built the foundations of Rhodes Island's medical section together.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe nobody else knows that, but I do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, fine, fine. I get it. Ask away.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Why did you join Rhodes Island, Dr. Warfarin?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why, to research medicine and save lives.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But Rhodes Island back then isn't anything like the Rhodes Island of today. At the time we were entirely focused on getting out of Kazdel. So why did you accept Dr. Kal'tsit's request?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How is Amiya's condition?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Physically, there's not much wrong with her, but her mental condition is a bit tricky, most likely because she's the King.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She talks in her sleep, she unconsciously reads the emotions of others, and she has trouble controlling her powers. A normal doctor probably wouldn't know where to begin with her.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That's why I came to you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And I thought you'd at least stay and help take care of the kid, but you ended up just dumping her on me.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Rhodes Island's command has fallen into chaos after losing both Theresa and the Doctor. There are plenty of eyes trying to snoop on us too. I have to take charge and maintain order.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And given the circumstances, you made the journey all the way here to bring the new King of Sarkaz to me.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is the King, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Theresa's a cruel one. How could she pick a fragile little girl like her to be her successor?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But Amiya is the last bit of hope she had left.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hope is a poison to the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I've heard much about your past deeds. Now that you have the living King of Sarkaz here with you, surely you've run a few ideas through your head?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Perhaps I should let the girl die painlessly in her sleep. It's a better fate than the pain and hardship she is destined to suffer.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This isn't how I wished for things to turn out either. If only it could've been another way.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But now that things have come to this, as a doctor, I just don't want to see another soul extinguish before my eyes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: As a doctor? Giving yourself a pat on the back now, aren't you? You may be a doctor, but you're also a conspirator, a cold-blooded puppetmaster, and an accessory to a war.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I won't deny that, but what about you, Warfarin?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You've refused to serve each and every Royal Court. You chose to stay away from war and hide in a border town, refusing to treat anyone but the locals. The name 'Mr. Blood' has long been known far and wide across Victorian and Columbian medical circles.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You'd rather be an outlier among the Vampires. Can someone like you really save all those trying to escape from war?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I know what you're trying to do, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You told me everything about your current situation, you brought the new King of Sarkaz here for treatment, and you act like you're the losers in this conflict. It's almost like you're trying to say you have nothing to do with this war anymore.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You're trying to rope me in.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And my response is still the same as all those years ago. Not happening.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Theresa's ideals have always been about more than just the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She set her sights far, and she had grand ambitions, but that was exactly why things turned out the way they did.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Everyone who starts a war has some wonderful ideals to circulate around.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She wanted to cure Oripathy.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Now this is the first time I ever heard about that.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And we've already put the fundamentals of the research together.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your handiwork?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I won't deny it. At some point in time, Rhodes Island will take action, because of Theresis.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But I can guarantee youâ€”
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have the power to keep yourself at arm's length.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So that's what you two talked about?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea. I didn't accept there and then. I've heard plenty of pompous big talk in my lifetime. It takes more than that to persuade me.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But, when she came to take you away the next day, she said she'd already spread the word that Mad Doctor Warfarin had joined Rhodes Island. It was too late for me to turn her down.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I was pissed. I'd been on the run for centuries, hiding from the Royal Court, and that was all it took?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She even had Mon3tr 'invite' and escort me to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Tell you the truth, I didn't believe her when she said she and Theresa wanted to cure Oripathy. It wasn't until she showed me the relevant research that I was convinced, albeit only barely.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: After that, I ended up staying, reluctantly.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hey, Amiya, why the gloomy face?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Am I drawing too much blood?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Impossible. Even if I was half-asleep, I know what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Are you thinking of leaving?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh? How'd we get there?!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I mean... We're about to enter Londinium. You're being awfully serious today, so I thought maybe you're trying to tell meâ€”
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're planning on leaving because what Rhodes Island is doing doesn't align with your goals.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you going to chase all the patients on the ship away?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Of course not. That's why we're stopped next to this mining platform.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you going to force me to go with you?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: No, most of our people will be staying at Rhodes Island. This operation isn't being conducted under the Rhodes Island name.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why would I leave, then?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I'm telling you all this today because Londinium is a big step and a new journey to you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: As your attending physician, I should prepare a gift for you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: A gift?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't think I've talked to anyone about this for some hundred years. It's only when I speak to Kal'tsit that I sometimes get the urge to discuss this.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: She knows just about everything, though, and a lot of it she doesn't actually need me to point out.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But, anyway, since I already started, let me go into it a little more.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Not all of those who start wars are truly fools, Amiya.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Most of them are extraordinarily smart. So smart that they know the easiest way to get what they want for themselves or their tribe is to take it from someone else.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: They know what it is they are doing. That's exactly why they're able to eliminate their enemies and spill rivers of blood without thinking twice.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And once they've accomplished their goals and built their new order, they're overthrown by the next one with an ambitious goal.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: And all this will repeat over and over, almost to no end. Actually, there might just be no end to it whatsoever.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *Sigh*, how I wish you didn't understand.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: *whine*...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh well. There's one more thing I need to make clear.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's right. I don't loathe war, per se.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I went into hiding when I decided to leave war and the Royal Court behind, and after I became a doctor, I made a rule for myself: Never treat anyone who has anything to do with warfare.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But if I truly loathed it, I should've strived to end war myself. I should have thrown myself into its midst like all those with ambitions.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I have nothing against the idea. I simply don't believe that line of thinking will lead us anywhere.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Some might think my choice is a cowardly one, because I'm tolerating and turning a blind eye to war. I may save many lives, but I've also allowed plenty more deaths to occur by inaction.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: To use a more scientific way to describe it, war is an endless internal friction. There are better ways to lead us toward the future.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: By the way, I stole that sentence from a book. Sounds cool, doesn't it? Maybe you should give it a read.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It does sound like it has a point. Which book did you steal that from?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I forgot...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Er... I'll look through my things and find it!
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, right. Another thingâ€”
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: There's a reason I chose not to become an elite operator. I know there will come a day when the path before you will be devastated by the flames of war.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: That's the hill I'm going to die on, and I'm not going to change my mind for anyone.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: So if you think I'm mad or disappointed, you're not quite right.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Because I never had any expectations to begin with.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: But I built Rhodes Island's blood bank with my own hands. I watched Rhodes Island's medical team grow from a few heads to the organization it is. I watched Rhodes Island grow into a pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: As long as I am confident that both you and Kal'tsit haven't abandoned your quest to overcome Oripathy...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I will stay at Rhodes Island, treating the patients here.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: This is my gift to you.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Dr. Warfarin...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promise you that I'll...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't make it sound like we won't see each other again. I don't want promises, but I'd love a vial of the Doctor's blood before you go.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Well... You might need Dr. Kal'tsit's approval.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Gah, you can't always listen to Kal'tsit, you know? You need to form your own opinions.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You can say that, but I won't let you take the Doctor's blood for no reason!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You need to learn some academic curiosity. I've been thinking, once you get back, you really should come intern under me.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Ahaha, I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's been a while since the last time I talked so much in one go. I sure could use a drink right now. Amiya, grab me that vial of blood to your right, will you?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hwuh?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Just playing with you. It's how I like to scare people these days.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: It's actually pretty fun to spook people with these Vampire stereotypes. The kids, in particular. They all go along with their shots after I pull something like that.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: You really shouldn't!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Say, Amiya...
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have a whole ship full of patients to care for. But don't forget, you'll always be my first patient at Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So you make sure you come back alive, okay?
attributes.name: Warfarin

attributes.content: I will!
attributes.name: Amiya
